question: For which of the following purposes will it be appropriate to use a tuple: (a) storing mean co-ordinates of a city, (b) storing everyday mean temperature and humidity of a city?

answers.feedback: Correct! The mean co-ordinates of a city will not change, and thus can be stored in a tuple.
Incorrect. Everyday weather of a city will change, but tuple objects are immutable.
Incorrect. Everyday weather of a city will change, but tuple objects are immutable.
Incorrect. The mean co-ordinates of a city will not change, and thus can be stored in a tuple.
